intro.text: Behold! A collection of meticulously crafted resume templates, forged in the fires of design and guided by ancient wisdom. Choose your path to a legendary career.

templates.title: Gimli's Strong Resume (One Page)
templates.description: A tough and simple one-page resume, like Gimli the Dwarf. It clearly shows your big wins, your skills (like being good with tools!), and that you're a loyal friend. It's very direct. Good for showing your strength and how you always help out.

templates.title: Aragorn's Kingly Resume (Two Parts)
templates.description: A royal-looking resume with two parts, like Aragorn. It shows your past adventures and your skills as a great leader. It talks about leading, being brave, and helping people. One part for your journeys, the other for your important jobs. Good for leaders who have done many great things.

templates.title: Legolas's Sharp Resume (Creative Style)
templates.description: A stylish and quick resume, like the Legolas Greenleaf. It shows you have a good eye for things, you're great at reaching your goals, and you work well. It can link to other pages with more about your best work. Good for people who are quick, smart, and do things with style.

templates.title: Gandalf's Custom Designs
templates.description: Need a resume that's truly unique? Gandalf can help create a custom design tailored to your specific needs and personal style. Let's make a resume that perfectly tells your story.
